title: mtad
content:
# mtad.yaml

```yaml
_schema-version: "3.1"
ID: migrationcf
description: Migrate services
version: 1.0.0
resources:
- name: my_destination_service
  type: org.cloudfoundry.managed-service
  parameters:
    service-plan: lite
    service: destination
    path: config.json
- name: my_connectivity_service
  type: org.cloudfoundry.managed-service
  parameters:
    service-plan: lite
    service: connectivity
```
